name: Onions (Android) [Test]
description:
You are Smash-Guy! He just wants some onions for his vegan Eggplant burger (trademark pending), but he lost them all! Help him collect them back, but watch out! Deadly Chompers give chase, trying to stop Smash-Guy from collecting the onions.

But an undercover mystery follows our hero, as the secret of the Chompers unveils itself in The Lab. Will Smash-Guy survive the onslaught of the fierce foes and escape with his life? Or will he get consumed not only by the hidden details, but also by the meat-hungry guts of the monsters?

Tap and hold to move, press with two fingers to restart the level. Save your progress in the "Options" menu. 

Contains : - 2 Sets of two levels each

                  - Campaign

                  - 4 Different Characters to play

                  - Secrets (patent pending since 1899)

                  - Also Ads (Sorry)

All earnings go to : my mom
